title: The delay between LCS games is waaaay too long
body: if riot wants LC$ to gain any real traction, theyre gonna need to cut down these delays between games, especially now that games are even shorter than before. If you look at real sports, the games either last way longer or happen more rapidly. Between champion select, interviews, random waiting etc the delayss just seem to last forever and I usually end up just not watching anymore

replies.body: It should improve in the summer split because they will have 2 stages and they will be going to the Bo3/Bo2 format.

Real sports? I watch them all the time. You are just rambling nonsense. Their are plenty of delays in any sport, just name it.
nfl games last hours and the break between them is the same, if not less

Next split is set up to be a Bo3 in the NA LCS and Bo2 in the Eu LCS which should be shorter breaks inbetween games and if I remember reading correctly they are going to run two streams so you should usually have a game to watch.

The only reason they didn't do it for this split was because the schedule was already setup.
